traits.name: Magic Resistance
entries: The forlarren has advantage on saving throws against spells and other magical effects.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The forlarren makes two claw attacks and one gore attack, or it makes three chromatic ray attacks.

actions.name: Claw
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 6 (1d6 + 3 damage) slashing damage.

actions.name: Gore
entries: Melee atk +5 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d8 + 3 damage) piercing damage.

actions.name: Chromatic Ray
entries: Ranged Spell atk +6 to hit, range 60 ft., one target. 3 (1d6 damage) lightning damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) fire damage plus 3 (1d6 damage) cold damage.

spellcasting.name: Innate Spellcasting
headerEntries: The forlarren's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma (spell save {@dc 14}). It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
